children.subject: <md>I signed up for a 1:1 with Facebook a few days ago I think, but not sure if it's closed now. Make sure your handshake profile is fully filled out too in order to sign up. There's some specific notes in the virtual tips:  https://career.berkeley.edu/Fairs/fairsTips?fbclid=IwAR3B15PDew_ODYgjLxSv3z7Qbyx_nAz44L3ijfaBDHgSWd7KfwfyRzD-4XA</md>

I just applied for LSCS major this summer. I realized today that Handshake's profile are locked based on your major displayed on CalCentral, and the major declarations are still not processed yet. So I'm not sure if I was even able to sign up for 1:1 for the popular tech companies in the career fair for today. What are some other methods students take to get internships? I am very new to this, especially with this remote format.

history.content: Hey, just want to ask around if there has ever been open 1-1 sessions for Amazon, Facebook and Zillow? I have been checking for the past few days, but never saw the link to sign up for 1-1 sessions. Is it because I'm too late? If there indeed has never been a link, how are we supposed to talk to recruiters from these companies? Thanks!
history.subject: Virtual career fair for internship
